entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
